_documentation.format: Each action maps to a list of key sequences
_documentation.modifiers: Ctrl+, Shift+, Alt+, Cmd+ (Cmd only works on Mac)
_documentation.special_keys: <space>, Tab, Return, Escape, F1-F35, Home, End, PageUp, PageDown, Up, Down, Left, Right
_documentation.multi_key: Use spaces to separate keys in sequence (e.g., 'g g' for vim-style gg)
_documentation.case: Single letters are case-insensitive, use Shift+ for uppercase (e.g., 'Shift+n' not 'N')
_documentation.platform_notes: Cmd+ modifier only works on macOS. Alt+ works on all platforms but behaves differently on Mac (Option key).
